Test

!1 presentation
Presentation is the record type for the high level presentations that a Cora based system offers to present the data in the system.

There are a total of 8 validation types for this record type.

!2 presentationCollectionVar
Presents collection variables

!2 presentationGroup
Presents groups

!2 presentationNumberVar
Presents number variables

!2 presentationRecordLink
Presents record links

!2 presentationRepeatingContainer
Makes it possible to add more information to each repeating element.

!2 presentationResourceLink
Presents resource links, used for binary data

!2 presentationSurroundingContainer
Makes it possible to present the data in other ways than just following the metadata structure

!2 presentationVar
Presents a text variable

!*< Setup record type definition

!define recordTypeId {presentation}
!define recordTypeDefinition {!-presentation type:{pGroup, pVar, pNumVar, container, pRecordLink, pCollVar, pResourceLink} (group)
	recordInfo (group, 1-1, noConstraint)
		id (textVariable, 1-1, noConstraint, I)
		type (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
		validationType (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
		dataDivider (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint, P, I)
		createdBy (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
		tsCreated (textVariable, 1-1, noConstraint)
		updated (group, 1-X, noConstraint)
			updatedBy (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
			tsUpdated (textVariable, 1-1, noConstraint)
	presentationsOf (group, 0-1, noConstraint)
		presentationOf (recordLink, 1-X, noConstraint)
	attributesToShow (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	presentationOf (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
	mode (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	repeat (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	childReferences (group, 0-1, noConstraint)
		childReference (group, 1-X, noConstraint)
			textStyle (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
			childStyle (collectionVariable, 0-X, noConstraint)
			refGroup (group, 1-2, noConstraint)
				ref type:{text} (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
				ref type:{presentation} (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
				ref type:{guiElement} (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
			minNumberOfRepeatingToShow (textVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
			presentationSize (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
			title (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
			titleHeadlineLevel (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
			addText (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
	presentationStyle (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	emptyTextId (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
	outputFormat (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	inputType (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	inputFormat (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	linkedRecordPresentations (group, 0-1, noConstraint)
		linkedRecordPresentation (group, 1-X, noConstraint)
			presentedRecordType (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
			presentation (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
	search (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
	presentAs (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	showLabel (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	specifiedLabelText (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
	showHeadline (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)
	specifiedHeadlineText (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
	specifiedHeadlineLevel (collectionVariable, 0-1, noConstraint)-!}

#idSource (userSupplied/timestamp/sequence) others true/false
!define recordTypeIdSource {userSupplied}
!define recordTypeIsPublic {true}
!define recordTypeUsePermissionUnit {false}
!define recordTypeUseVisibility {false}
!define recordTypeUseTrashBin {false}
!define recordTypeStoreInArchive {false}
